titles: By order from Mr. Vice-Chancellor. VVhereas Thomas Dye and John Fosset, have without licence from mee, and in contempt of the Chancellor, Masters and scholars of this University (to whom the ordering and governing of all carriers of what king soever, trading to or with the University and City of Oxford, doth of right belong) ...
author: University of Oxford.
Mews, Peter, 1619-1706.
notes: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Signed and dated at end: P. Mews Vice-Chan. Oxford April 22. 1672.
Another edition of the order dated April 27, 1671.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: University of Oxford --  History --  Sources --  Early works to 1800.
